meanings.definition: Relating to or affected by jaundice.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that the icterics skin color was due to jaundice.
meanings.sent2: Her icterics complexion made her look pale and sickly.
meanings.sent3: Even though he wore sunglasses, his icterics face still stood out in the crowd.
meanings.sent4: The icterics hue of the painting gave it a unique and unsettling vibe.
meanings.sent5: The icterics glow of the streetlight cast an eerie shadow on the wall.

meanings.sent1: The hospital admitted several icterics for treatment.
meanings.sent2: The icterics in the waiting room looked tired and unwell.
meanings.sent3: Despite being an icterics, she always had a positive attitude.
meanings.sent4: The icterics in the mirror reminded him of the need for a healthier lifestyle.
